name: Of Fate and the Unknown
description:
You are Nukh, the Third Hero of Siegeslicht. You have failed your mission to assassinate the Old King, and died futilely in the sewers.

But that is all in the past. The Unknown has other plans for you.

Whatever you do, know that Fate is inevitable.

  • Explore the Castle of the Overlord and use the Otherworldly Mirror to acquire over 30 hearts and souls
  • Hearts can be equipped to Nukh or reanimated as your ally
  • Equip souls to your party members and gain the skills contained within
  • Level up your characters however you want, distributing the gained stats every level to build the perfect party member
  • (Technically) multiple endings

Controls:

  • Z - Accept/Interact
  • X - Cancel/Open Menu (hold to fast-forward text)
  • Arrow keys - Move around/selection

The game is self-contained, but it is recommended to play the first game and/or the second game in the series.
